languages.text: "Комплементат-ритуал завершит долгую работу по исчислению неведомой сущности, чьи проявления мы наблюдали в виде неординарной работы систем корабля. Если сущность сия будет исчислена как техноеретическая — ритуал поможет нам ее изгнать. Если же нет — установить контакт".

traits.locale_text: "Комплиментат-ритуал завершит долгую работу по исчислению неведомой сущности, чьи проявления мы наблюдали в виде неординарной работы систем корабля. Если сущность сия будет исчислена как техноеретическая — ритуал поможет нам ее изгнать. Если же нет — установить контакт".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "The complementa-ritual will conclude the long effort of determining the unknown entity whose influence we have observed through various extraordinarities within the ship's systems. In the event that this entity is classified as tech-heretical, the ritual will help us banish it from the ship. If the entity is not classified as such, we will attempt to make contact with it."
languages.original_text: "Комплементат-ритуал завершит долгую работу по исчислению неведомой сущности, чьи проявления мы наблюдали в виде неординарной работы систем корабля. Если сущность сия будет исчислена как техноеретическая — ритуал поможет нам ее изгнать. Если же нет — установить контакт".

In the event that this entity is classified as tech-heretical, the ritual will help us banish it from the ship. If the entity is not classified as such, we will attempt to make contact with it."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: 「補足の儀式により、未知の存在を判定する我らの永きにわたる努力は終わりを迎える。我らは船のシステムにある様々な非凡なものを通じてその影響を観察してきた。この存在が技術異端だとみなされた場合、儀式によってこの船から追放できるだろう。もし技術異端だとみなされないのであれば、接触を試みよう」
languages.original_text: "The complementa-ritual will conclude the long effort of determining the unknown entity whose influence we have observed through various extraordinarities within the ship's systems. In the event that this entity is classified as tech-heretical, the ritual will help us banish it from the ship. If the entity is not classified as such, we will attempt to make contact with it."

traits.locale_text: 「補足の儀式により、未知の存在を判定する我らの永きにわたる努力は終わりを迎える。我らは船のシステムにある様々な非凡なものを通じてその影響を観察してきた。この存在が技術異端だとみなされた場合、儀式によってこの船から追放できるだろう。もし技術異端だとみなされないのであれば、接触を試みよう」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: “我们要举行重组仪式，彻底确定这个实体的本质，解决它带来的问题。我们已经通过飞船系统内的各种异常现象观察到它的影响。如果该实体被归类为技术异端，那么这个仪式能帮助我们把它驱逐出飞船。如果该实体不归于此类，我们会尝试与其建立联系。”
languages.original_text: "The complementa-ritual will conclude the long effort of determining the unknown entity whose influence we have observed through various extraordinarities within the ship's systems. In the event that this entity is classified as tech-heretical, the ritual will help us banish it from the ship. If the entity is not classified as such, we will attempt to make contact with it."

traits.locale_text: “我们要举行重组仪式，彻底确定这个实体的本质，解决它带来的问题。我们已经通过飞船系统内的各种异常现象观察到它的影响。如果该实体被归类为技术异端，那么这个仪式能帮助我们把它驱逐出飞船。如果该实体不归于此类，我们会尝试与其建立联系。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Das Complementa-Ritual beendet die langen Bemühungen, die unbekannte Entität zu identifizieren, deren Einfluss wir durch verschiedene Außergewöhnlichkeiten in den Systemen des Schiffs beobachten konnten. Sollte diese Entität als tech-ketzerisch klassifiziert werden, hilft uns das Ritual, sie vom Schiff zu verbannen. Sollte die Entität nicht derart klassifiziert werden, so werden wir versuchen, mit ihr in Kontakt zu treten."
languages.original_text: "The complementa-ritual will conclude the long effort of determining the unknown entity whose influence we have observed through various extraordinarities within the ship's systems. In the event that this entity is classified as tech-heretical, the ritual will help us banish it from the ship. If the entity is not classified as such, we will attempt to make contact with it."

traits.locale_text: "Das Complementa-Ritual beendet die langen Bemühungen, die unbekannte Entität zu identifizieren, deren Einfluss wir durch verschiedene Außergewöhnlichkeiten in den Systemen des Schiffs beobachten konnten. Sollte diese Entität als tech-ketzerisch klassifiziert werden, hilft uns das Ritual, sie vom Schiff zu verbannen. Sollte die Entität nicht derart klassifiziert werden, so werden wir versuchen, mit ihr in Kontakt zu treten."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: « Le rituel complémentaire va conclure un processus de longue haleine visant à déterminer la nature de l'entité inconnue dont nous avons pu constater l'influence par le biais de divers phénomènes inhabituels survenus dans les systèmes du vaisseau. Si cette entité est considérée comme technohérétique, le rituel nous aidera à la bannir. Dans le cas contraire, nous tenterons d'entrer en contact avec elle. »
languages.original_text: "The complementa-ritual will conclude the long effort of determining the unknown entity whose influence we have observed through various extraordinarities within the ship's systems. In the event that this entity is classified as tech-heretical, the ritual will help us banish it from the ship. If the entity is not classified as such, we will attempt to make contact with it."

traits.locale_text: « Le rituel complémentaire va conclure un processus de longue haleine visant à déterminer la nature de l'entité inconnue dont nous avons pu constater l'influence par le biais de divers phénomènes inhabituels survenus dans les systèmes du vaisseau. Si cette entité est considérée comme technohérétique, le rituel nous aidera à la bannir. Dans le cas contraire, nous tenterons d'entrer en contact avec elle. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: «El complementa-ritual concluirá la ardua labor de identificar a la entidad desconocida cuya influencia se ha venido observando en el comportamiento insólito de los diversos sistemas de la nave. En caso de que la entidad sea clasificada como tecnoherética, el ritual nos ayudará a desterrarla de la nave. Si la entidad no fuese clasificada como tal, intentamos contactar con ella».
languages.original_text: "The complementa-ritual will conclude the long effort of determining the unknown entity whose influence we have observed through various extraordinarities within the ship's systems. In the event that this entity is classified as tech-heretical, the ritual will help us banish it from the ship. If the entity is not classified as such, we will attempt to make contact with it."

traits.locale_text: «El complementa-ritual concluirá la ardua labor de identificar a la entidad desconocida cuya influencia se ha venido observando en el comportamiento insólito de los diversos sistemas de la nave. En caso de que la entidad sea clasificada como tecnoherética, el ritual nos ayudará a desterrarla de la nave. Si la entidad no fuese clasificada como tal, intentamos contactar con ella».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: "Tümleyici ayin, geminin sistemlerindeki etkisini gözlemlediğimiz ancak henüz tanımlayamadığımız varlığı belirleme çabamıza son verecek. Bu varlık, tekno kâfir olarak sınıflandırılırsa ayin sayesinde gemiden sürülecek. Tekno kâfir olarak sınıflandırılmaması durumda ise varlıkla iletişime geçmeye çalışacağız."
languages.original_text: "The complementa-ritual will conclude the long effort of determining the unknown entity whose influence we have observed through various extraordinarities within the ship's systems. In the event that this entity is classified as tech-heretical, the ritual will help us banish it from the ship. If the entity is not classified as such, we will attempt to make contact with it."

traits.locale_text: "Tümleyici ayin, geminin sistemlerindeki etkisini gözlemlediğimiz ancak henüz tanımlayamadığımız varlığı belirleme çabamıza son verecek. Bu varlık, tekno kâfir olarak sınıflandırılsa ayin sayesinde gemiden sürülecek. Tekno kâfir olarak sınıflandırılmaması durumda da varlıkla iletişime geçmeye çalışacağız."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
